dct_title_s: Plan detaillé de la Cité; dedié à Messire Louis Basile de Bernage, Conseiller d'Etat Prevôt des Marchands, et à Messieurs les Echevins de la Ville de Paris par M. l'Abbé Delagrive, Geographe ordinaire de la Ville; Bourgoin le jeune scripsit.
dct_description_sm: Shows individual buildings. Includes ill. of boats. 1 map; 43 x 81 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
